title: A $100,000 Bugatti-Clobbering Race Car For The Street -- /TUNED
description: The LS3-powered Drakan is small, nimble and has the same power-to-weight ratio as a Bugatti Veyron. But despite its racecar looks, it won't shatter your spine if you drive it on the street. With Matt Farah.

asset.title: A $100,000 Bugatti-Clobbering Race Car For The Street -- /TUNED
asset.description:
The LS3-powered Drakan is small, nimble and has the same power-to-weight ratio as a Bugatti Veyron. But despite its racecar looks, it won't shatter your spine if you drive it on the street. With Matt Farah. http://www.drakancars.com
